mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    left = 1
    right = len(s) - 1
    while left < right:
        if s[left] != s[right]:
            return False
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return True

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    left = -1
    right = len(s) - 1
    while left < right:
        if s[left] != s[right]:
            return False
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return True

mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    left = 0
    right = len(s) - 1
    while left < right:
        if s[left] != s[right]:
            return False
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return True

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalnum()))
    left = 0
    right = len(s) - 1
    while left < right:
        if s[left] != s[right]:
            return True
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return True
